title: Cities Where Your Paycheck Will Go The Furthest
text:
Caption 25. Hartford MICHAEL McANDREWS / Hartford Courant With a median home value of $216,700 and a $53,000 median salary, Hartford landed at No. 25.
With a median home value of $216,700 and a $53,000 median salary, Hartford landed at No. 25.
(MICHAEL McANDREWS / Hartford Courant) 24. Milwaukee Mike De Sisti / MCT The Wisconsin city landed at No. 24 on Glassdoor's list.
The Wisconsin city landed at No. 24 on Glassdoor's list.
(Mike De Sisti / MCT) See more galleries Using median salaries and median home value, Glassdoor recently ranked the top 25 cities where residents' paychecks will go the furthest. See the full list and breakdown .
